text: Ndivo avo vakatuma kubva mune vasina kudzidza mutumwa (Muhammad (SAW)) mukati mavo, achiverenga ndima dzavo kwavari, uye achivachenura (kubva mukusatenda), uye achivadzidzisa Bhuku (Qurâ€™aan) neruzivo Al-Hikmah (Sunnah: Manamatiro nemagariro aMuhammad (SAW)), kunyange zvazvo vakange vari mukurasika kuri pachena
